title: Will Parliament vote on Boris Johnson's Brexit deal? Today's questions answered
text:
This week will be an incredibly important one for Boris Johnson's Brexit strategy.

Having negotiated a new deal with the EU and passed it at a European Council meeting at the end of last week, now he must get it through Parliament.

An attempt to get the deal through the House over the weekend - in a rare Saturday sitting - was derailed when an amendment was passed withholding support for the deal until it has been passed in law, in a Withdrawal Agreement Bill.

The Government's new task is to pass the Withdrawal Agreement in legislation in time for the deal to be ratified before October 31.

Follow the latest developments on our live blog.

Is there going to be a vote on Boris’s deal?

Maybe. The...
description: This week will be an incredibly important one for Boris Johnson's Brexit strategy.
